  • Method Details

    • acquire

      public long acquire(int points)
      Acquires the given number of points from this RateLimiter, blocking until the request can be granted.
      Parameters:
      points - The points to remove.
      Returns:
      time spent sleeping to enforce rate, in ms; 0 if not rate-limited.
